external_references.description: Larson, S. and Wise, J. (2022, February 15). Charting TA2541's Flight. Retrieved September 12, 2023.

description: [TA2541](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1018) has hosted malicious files on various platforms including Google Drive, OneDrive, Discord, PasteText, ShareText, and GitHub.(Citation: Proofpoint TA2541 February 2022)
